hero.title: Your Personal AI Language Tutor
hero.subtitle: Unlock fluency with your AI-powered language partner. Enjoy fun, interactive conversations and get instant feedback to speak confidently, faster.

description.title: More Than an App, It's Your Conversation Partner
description.desc: Tired of memorizing vocabulary lists? We believe in learning through conversation. Speak naturally, get instant feedback, and build the confidence to chat about anything.

benefits.title: Chat About What You Love
benefits.desc: Practice speaking about topics you actually care about. Our AI adapts to your interests, making every conversation fun and engaging.

benefits.title: Improve With Every Word
benefits.desc: Don't wait for feedback. Get instant corrections on your grammar, pronunciation, and word choice to accelerate your learning.

benefits.title: Understand Culture, Not Just Grammar
benefits.desc: Go beyond textbook learning. Master idioms, cultural nuances, and the art of conversation to speak like a native.

benefits.title: Track Your Journey to Fluency
benefits.desc: See your progress in real-time. Our smart-tracking system visualizes your achievements, motivating you every step of the way.

features.title: A Better Way to Fluency
features.subtitle: Our method is simple, effective, and built around you. Here's how you'll go from beginner to confident speaker in four easy steps.

steps.title: 1. Start a Conversation
steps.description: Choose a topic that interests you or let our AI suggest one. From discussing your favorite movie to debating a hot topic, the choice is yours.

steps.title: 2. Speak Naturally
steps.description: Engage in a flowing, natural conversation. Our AI listens, understands, and responds like a real person, encouraging you to express yourself freely.

steps.title: 3. Receive Instant Feedback
steps.description: After your chat, get a detailed breakdown of your performance. See corrections, learn new vocabulary, and get tips on pronunciation.

steps.title: 4. Watch Yourself Improve
steps.description: Track your progress over time with our intuitive dashboard. Set new goals, revisit past lessons, and see your fluency soar.

questions.q: How is this different from other language apps?
questions.a: You get real-time, interactive conversation with an AI, plus tailored feedback—like a personal tutor, but always available!
We're starting with English, Spanish, and French, but more languages will be added soon. Let us know your requests!

questions.q: Can I try it for free?
questions.a: Absolutely! You get free lessons with our Starter plan—no credit card required.
